far <Aaiza.Zafar@chalhoub.com>; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>; Chadi Dagher <Chadi.Dagher@3d-consultants.com>
Subject: RSO UAE - NEW STORE RE-OPENING | Swarovski - Mirdif City Center 
 

Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the opening of Swarovski - Mirdif City Center.

 

The boutique team started welcoming its Guests on the 1st of OCT at 10 am.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all teams members involved in this project :

 

*	Brand team -  @Jessica Wendt <mailto:Jessica.Wendt@chalhoub.com>  @Benedicte Blanc <mailto:Benedicte.Blanc@chalhoub.com>  @Mohamed Eleskafy <mailto:Mohamed.Eleskafy@chalhoub.com>  
*	IT team - @Ali Zeb Siyal <mailto:Alizeb.Siyal@chalhoub.com>  @Rizaldy Amada <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com> 
*	Admin team - @Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  @Mary Janice Dofeliz <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>  @Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>  @Pierre BAA SOLO <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>  @Rami Riman <mailto:Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com> 
*	Maintenance team - @Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>  @Sreeraj Prakasam <mailto:Sreeraj.Prakasam@chalhoub.com>  @Retail Maintenance <mailto:RetailMaintenance@chalhoub.com> 
*	GA team - @Mohammed El Neel <mailto:Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>  @Mahmoud Abd Hamid <mailto:Mahmoud.Khedr@chalhoub.com>  @Salwa Al Mamari <mailto:Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com>  @Sharon Pinto <mailto:Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com> 
*	Accounts - @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  @Gayasuddin Mirza <mailto:Gayasuddin.Mirza@chalhoub.com>  
*	Group Security - @Rawad Hossein <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> 
*	3d - @Sooraj Kannu <mailto:Sooraj.Kannu@3d-consultants.com>

Zafar <Aaiza.Zafar@chalhoub.com>; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>; Chadi Dagher <Chadi.Dagher@3d-consultants.com>
Subject: RSO UAE - NEW STORE RE-OPENING | Swarovski - Mirdif City Center

 

Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the opening of Swarovski - Mirdif City Center.

 

The boutique team started welcoming its Guests on the 1st of OCT at 10 am.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all teams members involved in this project :

 

*	Brand team -  @Jessica Wendt <mailto:Jessica.Wendt@chalhoub.com>  @Benedicte Blanc <mailto:Benedicte.Blanc@chalhoub.com>  @Mohamed Eleskafy <mailto:Mohamed.Eleskafy@chalhoub.com>  
*	IT team - @Ali Zeb Siyal <mailto:Alizeb.Siyal@chalhoub.com>  @Rizaldy Amada <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com> 
*	Admin team - @Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  @Mary Janice Dofeliz <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>  @Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>  @Pierre BAA SOLO <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>  @Rami Riman <mailto:Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com> 
*	Maintenance team - @Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>  @Sreeraj Prakasam <mailto:Sreeraj.Prakasam@chalhoub.com>  @Retail Maintenance <mailto:RetailMaintenance@chalhoub.com> 
*	GA team - @Mohammed El Neel <mailto:Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>  @Mahmoud Abd Hamid <mailto:Mahmoud.Khedr@chalhoub.com>  @Salwa Al Mamari <mailto:Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com>  @Sharon Pinto <mailto:Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com> 
*	Accounts - @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  @Gayasuddin Mirza <mailto:Gayasuddin.Mirza@chalhoub.com>  
*	Group Security - @Rawad Hossein <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> 
*	3d - @Sooraj Kannu <mailto:Sooraj.Kannu@3d-consultants.com>
